Method Detail

operate

double operate()
               throws OperatorFailedException
operates on the model.

Returns:
the hastings ratio of this operator.
Throws:
OperatorFailedException - if the operator failed and should be rejected

Called to tell operator that operation was accepted

Parameters:
deviation - the log ratio accepted on

Reset operator acceptance records.

getCount

int getCount()
Returns:
the total number of operations since last call to reset().

Returns:
the number of acceptances since last call to reset().

setAcceptCount

void setAcceptCount(int acceptCount)
Set the number of acceptances since last call to reset(). This is used to restore the state of the operator

Parameters:
acceptCount - number of acceptances

the number of rejections since last call to reset().

Set the number of rejections since last call to reset(). This is used to restore the state of the operator

Parameters:
rejectCount - number of rejections

getWeight

double getWeight()
Returns:
the relative weight of this operator.

setWeight

void setWeight(double weight)
sets the weight of this operator. The weight determines the proportion of time spent using this operator. This is relative to a 'standard' operator weight of 1.

Parameters:
weight - the relative weight of this parameter - should be positive.

the name of this operator
